title: Google Restricts AI Images Amid Outcry Over Chatbot's Treatment of Race
description: The search company said it would pause a feature in the chatbot Gemini as it worked to address recent issues with “inaccuracies in some historical depictions.”

title: Nvidia Declares AI a 'Whole New Industry'---and Investors Agree
description: In a tech industry renowned for short-lived frenzies, some chip executives and analysts see the AI boom as increasingly sustainable.

title: Asia Chip Stocks Gain After Nvidia Signals Booming AI Demand
description: Shares of Asian chip makers rose Thursday after strong earnings from Nvidia buttressed expectations of booming global demand for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence.

title: AI's Unlikely Benefactor: Blackstone's 77-Year-Old CEO Steve Schwarzman
description: The private-equity billionaire has donated more than half a billion dollars for artificial-intelligence education and research.
